The riot will be in 2 hours time 4 Pm pst in verok Members world 59 and none member world 57 Feel free to come ~thanks~ runescape contact emoh8er2 join my clan chat!

item.title: Runescape Trade limit and pk Gay bounty hunter WTF! Read please
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

Haha. I ran into one of these not too long ago.
“We pay to PK!”
Hahahah. What a bunch of pitiful people. They must not like strategical fighting, since Bounty Hunter demands it. They must not like set fights, because dueling/BH demands it. They must hate organized-full out war, because Castle Wars/Clan Wars/BH demands it.

I swear, these people are ignorant to all the possibilities they actually have. The wonders in the large amount of pvp options laid out for them, yet they want to be able to run around 1/10 of the game map just to stalk out people? Jesus Christ.

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape Trade limit and pk Gay bounty hunter WTF! Read please
item.dc:creator: @skullman25 skullman25
item.description:
@skullman25 wrote:

Runescape is gay. It wasnt even that good when they had pking and stuff. I never got into it. There are so many better MMORPGS out htere, but why dont you get off your ass and go outside? Rioting over a game crosses the line. They dont care what you want. They made it to make money, not to entertain kiddies. They wont even bother to read about your ‘riots’

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape Trade limit and pk Gay bounty hunter WTF! Read please
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

[quote=“jme, post:6, topic:192938”][quote author=alexplt178 link=topic=256770.msg2135489#msg2135489 date=1206497887]
thanks guys im sick of runescape and ruining there game!
[/quote]

Then why do you continue to play it.

It’s just a damn game. Stop acting like it’s your life. Anyone who holds protests or “riots” over a game needs to take a serious look at themselves imo.[/quote]

This post is epic success. If only someone could implant it in the heads of every single runescaper. =(

Read full topic
